1: <pb/><t>Ajawaxel,</t> <t>¿C'ä jampa' lo</t> <t>quinsach pa jolom la?</t> <t>¿La kas xa c'u jumul</t> <t>quinsach pa jolom la?</t> <t>¿C'ä jampa' lo cätakej na la</t> <t>u c'u'ic ib la chnuwäch?</t>
2: <t>¿C'ä jampa' ri nu c'aslibal</t> <t>xukuje' ri wanima' quecoch'on na</t> <t>xukuje' quebison na ronojel k'ij?</t> <t>¿C'ä jampa' quinel</t> <t>chuxe' ri u takanic ri c'ulel?</t>
3: <t>Ajawaxel, nu Dios,</t> <t>¡chinila' la,</t> <t>tzelej la u wäch ri nu tzij,</t> <t>che nojisaj la ri nu bak'wäch</t> <t>che ri chäj!</t> <t>¡Ma ta chinkaj</t> <t>chupam ri waram re cämical!</t>
4: <t>Mubij ri nu c'ulel:</t> <t>“¡Nu ch'äcom!”</t> <t>Mäquicotic we quintzakic.</t>
5: <pb/><t>Ri in nu cu'bisam nu c'u'x</t> <t>pa ri tok'ob la;</t> <t>ri wanima' cäquicotic</t> <t>rumal rech chi quincol la.</t>
6: <t>¡Quinbixoj ri Ajawaxel</t> <t>rumal ri utzil ri u banom chwe!</t>
